testsuite.name: As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop

testcase.name: AC 1: Fleet User goes to products detail page when remove options is selected then the add options wizard is opened
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 1: Fleet User goes to products detail page when remove options is selected then the add options wizard is opened

testcase.name: AC 2: Fleet User opens the remove options wizard when fleet user he sees an option that is not in his sim line he can not remove this option
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 2: Fleet User opens the remove options wizard when fleet user he sees an option that is not in his sim line he can not remove this option

testcase.name: AC 3: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he selected to remove this option then the option is shown under
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 3: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he selected to remove this option then the option is shown under

testcase.name: AC 4: Fleet User is in the wizard and sees all the options he already has under Previously added
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 4: Fleet User is in the wizard and sees all the options he already has under Previously added

testcase.name: AC 6: Fleet User added options in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then added options are unselected again
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 6: Fleet User added options in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then added options are unselected again

testcase.name: AC 7: Fleet User removed an option in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then the options are removed from the overview
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 7: Fleet User removed an option in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then the options are removed from the overview

testcase.name: AC 8: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then the options that are selected are removed from his SIM line
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 8: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then the options that are selected are removed from his SIM line

testcase.name: AC 9: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then he changes his mind and cancels it the user sees the wizard again
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 9: Fleet User removes an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then he changes his mind and cancels it the user sees the wizard again

testcase.name: AC 10: Fleet User should not see buttons that allow him to go back to Fleet Portal when he's coming from oneApp
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop AC 10: Fleet User should not see buttons that allow him to go back to Fleet Portal when he's coming from oneApp

testcase.name: should show error message when fleet user ordering is not enabled
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop Split bill guard checks should show error message when fleet user ordering is not enabled

testcase.name: should show error message when product is not of type SB20
testcase.classname: Line Remove Options As a fleet user I can use remove options on desktop Split bill guard checks should show error message when product is not of type SB20
